trans-unit.source: An abstract base class for perspective and orthographic projection cameras.
trans-unit.target: 透視和正視投影照相機抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's far clip plane.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定從相機到相機遠裁剪平面的距離。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not specify a value for this property, its value defaults to positive infinity.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者未指定此屬性的值，其值會預設為正的無限大。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's far clip plane.
trans-unit.target: 雙精度浮點數指定從相機到相機遠裁剪平面的距離。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.FarPlaneDistance*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.FarPlaneDistance*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.FarPlaneDistance*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> which defines the direction in which the camera is looking in world coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>其定義所在相機正在尋找全局座標中的方向。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that represents the direction of the camera's field of view.
trans-unit.target: 代表的相機的視野方向的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection*> dependency property..
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection*>相依性屬性...</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's near clip plane.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定從相機到相機接近裁剪平面的距離。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that this property be set to a positive value.
trans-unit.target: 建議您將此屬性設為正整數值。

trans-unit.source: If the user does not set a value for this property, its value defaults to 0.125.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者未設定此屬性的值，該值會預設為 0.125。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Double that specifies the distance from the camera of the camera's near clip plane.
trans-unit.target: 雙精確度浮點數指定從相機到相機接近裁剪平面的距離。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.NearPlaneDistance*> dependency property..
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.NearPlaneDistance*>相依性屬性...</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.NearPlaneDistance*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of the camera in world coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定相機的位置中全局座標。

trans-unit.source: Note that this property returns the location of the camera, not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection%2A> on which the camera's projection is centered.
trans-unit.target: 請注意這個屬性傳回不在觀景窗位置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection%2A>上的相機投影會置中。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.LookDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> that specifies the position of the camera.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>指定相機的位置。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.Position*> dependency property..
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.Position*>相依性屬性...</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.Position*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> which defines the upward direction of the camera.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>定義相機的向上方向。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Vector3D that represents the upward direction in the scene projection.
trans-unit.target: 代表場景投影中的向上方向的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.UpDirection*> dependency property..
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.UpDirection*>相依性屬性...</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ProjectionCamera.UpDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
